history.proof: hauto lq: on depth: 3use: m_infty, filterlim_le_m_infty, is_lim_ext_loc, is_lim_comp.

exceptions.exn: In environment f, g : R -> R x : Rbar H : Rbar_locally' x (fun y : R => g y <= f y) H0 : is_lim f x m_infty H1 : R -> Prop H2 : Rbar_locally m_infty H1 Unable to unify "forall P : R -> Prop, Rbar_locally m_infty P -> filtermap (fun x : R => f (?M2364 x)) (Rbar_locally' ?M2365) P" with "match x with | Finite a => locally' a (fun x : R => H1 (g x)) | p_infty => exists M : R, forall x : R, M < x -> (fun x0 : R => H1 (g x0)) x | m_infty => exists M : R, forall x : R, x < M -> (fun x0 : R => H1 (g x0)) x end".

In environment f, g : R -> R x : Rbar H : Rbar_locally' x (fun y : R => g y <= f y) H0 : is_lim f x m_infty H1 : R -> Prop H2 : Rbar_locally m_infty H1 Unable to unify "forall P : R -> Prop, Rbar_locally ?M2366 P -> filtermap g (Rbar_locally' x) P" with "match x with | Finite a => locally' a (fun x : R => H1 (g x)) | p_infty => exists M : R, forall x : R, M < x -> (fun x0 : R => H1 (g x0)) x | m_infty => exists M : R, forall x : R, x < M -> (fun x0 : R => H1 (g x0)) x end".

In environment f, g : R -> R x : Rbar H : Rbar_locally' x (fun y : R => g y <= f y) H0 : is_lim f x m_infty H1 : R -> Prop H2 : Rbar_locally m_infty H1 Unable to unify "Prop" with "filtermap g (Rbar_locally' x) H1".

In environment f, g : R -> R x : Rbar H : Rbar_locally' x (fun y : R => g y <= f y) H0 : is_lim f x m_infty H1 : R -> Prop H2 : Rbar_locally m_infty H1 Unable to unify "Rbar_locally m_infty H1" with "ex_finite_lim g x".

In environment f, g : R -> R x : Rbar H : Rbar_locally' x (fun y : R => g y <= f y) H0 : is_lim f x m_infty H1 : R -> Prop H2 : Rbar_locally m_infty H1 Unable to unify "Prop" with "ex_finite_lim g x".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

In environment f, g : R -> R x : Rbar H : Rbar_locally' x (fun y : R => g y <= f y) H0 : is_lim f x m_infty H1 : R -> Prop H2 : Rbar_locally m_infty H1 Unable to unify "match ?M2379 with | Finite x => match ?M2380 with | Finite y => x <= y | p_infty => True | m_infty => False end | p_infty => match ?M2380 with | p_infty => True | _ => False end | m_infty => True end" with "exists eps : posreal, forall y : R_UniformSpace, ball (Lim g x) eps y -> H1 y".

In environment f, g : R -> R x : Rbar H : Rbar_locally' x (fun y : R => g y <= f y) H0 : is_lim f x m_infty H1 : R -> Prop H2 : Rbar_locally m_infty H1 Unable to unify "Prop" with "Rbar_locally (Lim g x) H1".

In environment f, g : R -> R x : Rbar H : Rbar_locally' x (fun y : R => g y <= f y) H0 : is_lim f x m_infty H1 : R -> Prop H2 : Rbar_locally m_infty H1 Unable to unify "forall P : R -> Prop, Rbar_locally m_infty P -> filtermap ?M2378 ?F P" with "exists eps : posreal, forall y : R_UniformSpace, ball (Lim g x) eps y -> H1 y".

ctx: specialize (is_lim_ext f (fun y => g y) x m_infty).
exceptions.exn: In environment f, g : R -> R x : Rbar H : Rbar_locally' x (fun y : R => g y <= f y) H0 : is_lim f x m_infty H1 : R -> Prop H2 : Rbar_locally m_infty H1 H3 : (forall y : R, f y = (fun y0 : R => g y0) y) -> is_lim f x m_infty -> is_lim (fun y : R => g y) x m_infty Unable to unify "is_lim (fun y : R => g y) x m_infty" with "Rbar_locally (Lim g x) H1".

original: intros. intros H1 H2. apply is_lim_comp with (f:=f) (k:=m_infty). - apply is_lim_ext_loc with (g:=g) (x:=x). + apply H1. + apply Lim_correct'. apply H2. - apply H1. - apply filterlim_le. apply H1. apply filterlim_le_m_infty. + specialize (is_lim_ext f (fun y => g y) x m_infty). intros H3. apply H3. * intros y. reflexivity. * apply H2. + apply H1.
